title: $1.9 Billion Powerball Jackpot Drawing Delayed by Security Hitch
description: A participating lottery needed “extra time to complete the required security protocols,” Powerball said in explaining the delay in Monday night’s drawing.
dc:creator: Amanda Holpuch and Johnny Diaz
media:description: The Powerball jackpot grew to $1.9 billion after the drawing Saturday night produced no top prize winner.
